scripts.deployment: npm run install:prod && npm run build
scripts.load:fixtures: cd api && php bin/console doctrine:schema:update --force --complete && php bin/console doctrine:fixtures:load --no-interaction
scripts.init: npm install --ignore-scripts && npm run install && cd api && php bin/console doctrine:database:create --if-not-exists && cd .. && npm run load:fixtures
scripts.install:api:new: npm run install:api && cd api && php bin/console lexik:jwt:generate-keypair --no-interaction --overwrite
scripts.install:prod: npm install --ignore-scripts && concurrently "npm run install:api:prod" "npm run install:client"
scripts.install:api:prod: cd api && composer install --no-dev --optimize-autoloader && php bin/console doctrine:database:create --if-not-exists && npm run load:migration
scripts.dev:api: cd api && symfony server:stop && symfony server:start --port=8000
